description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***appointment calendar*** and then on ***QR code to appointment calendar***.
2. Select the appointment booking calendar you want.
3. Click on the QR code to enlarge it. So you can download, print and process it afterwards.
title: QR code to each appointment calendar
